name: Kids of the Apocalypse - EMPIRE (ft. Reo Cragun & Icona Pop)

metadata.description:
EMPIRE is the anthemic opening soundtrack of the Kids of the Apocalypse world, featuring multiplatinum superstars Icona Pop and Web3 legend Reo Cragun.

BONUS 1: First 33 collectors can claim a free KOTA Season 1 NFT via Telegram (Sol wallet required).

BONUS 2: *ALL* collectors can claim a a free alternate version of the song – ‘EMPIRE’ (KOTA’s Breakbeat Apocalypse Remix) – in June

Welcome to the resistance.

Kids of the Apocalypse is an audiovisual project spanning music, comics and film, dreamed up by a group of award-winning musicians and directors from around the world in partnership with Neon Gold Records (Charli XCX, Pussy Riot, Tove Lo, et. al) and Ziggy Ziggy.

Carrying on from the success of KOTA’s sold out genesis collections on Solana – the first SOL project ever to crack Billboard's Top 10 NFT charts (twice!) – KOTA arrives on Sound rolling out new music every month this year featuring an incredible lineup of stars from web3 + beyond, culminating in the release of the KOTA’s debut mixtape in late 2023

Enter the immersive world of Kids of the Apocalypse at kidsoftheapocalypse.com

Telegram link for collectors: t.me/kotaworldwide
metadata.name: EMPIRE (ft. Reo Cragun & Icona Pop) #1
